about_the_game:
It's winter and the town is full of cozy snowmen!

Players can roll through the snowy village, create giant snowballs, and decorate their own snowmen with a variety of decorations to personalize the village.

How to play.

-Create a snowman

The game starts in a snowy town. Players must roll snowballs to create large and small snowballs, and combine them to create a snowman according to their preferences. Adjust the direction of the snowball to find the best place to place the snowman. You can create all kinds of shapes with your snowballs.

-Decorating your snowman

Once you've completed your snowman, you can decorate it with a variety of accessories and decorations. Twigs, buckets, rocks, carrots, and more - get creative and personalize your snowman!

-Find frozen objects!

All around town there are objects frozen by snow and ice. Finding them and thawing them out is a small element of exploration that will add to the fun.

A family lives in the village and over the course of the game, they will age as well. Seeing that natural change will give players a special emotional experience.

As time passes, the scenery of the sky also changes. From morning to night, at different times of the day, the sky changes to different colors and moods, and beautiful snow continues to fall. The snowflakes falling from the sky make the atmosphere of the game richer and more beautiful.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SSE4.2 required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SSE4.2 required

short_description: Feel the winter spirit in the white village and create a happy snowman! Roll the snow, make big snowballs, and decorate the village with various decorations to make your own snowman. Before spring comes.
